titleStmt.title: Sixe sermons. Preached by Edward Chaloner Doctor of Diuinitie, and Fellow of All-Soules Colledge in Oxford
titleStmt.author: Chaloner, Edward, 1590 or 91-1625.

titleStmt.title: Sixe sermons. Preached by Edward Chaloner Doctor of Diuinitie, and Fellow of All-Soules Colledge in Oxford
titleStmt.author: Chaloner, Edward, 1590 or 91-1625.

notesStmt.note: A different collection from "Six sermons now first published", Oxford: W. Turner, for Henry Curteyn, 1629.

"Naioth or The Vniuersity charter", "Ephesus common pleas", "Iudahs prerogatiues", "The Gentiles creede, or The naturall knowledge of God", and "Pauls peregrinations, or The trauellers guide" each has separate dated title page (the first of these dated 1622); pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Central Library (Bristol, Eng.).
